Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize historical velocity to guide planning.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Reduce the overall severity of blockers encountered.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize total task effort selected for a sprint.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Increase the rate at which sprint goals are achieved.

Name: minimize_backlog_size
Description: Keep the product backlog lean to reduce management overhead.

Name: minimize_feature_effort
Description: Prefer features with lower implementation effort.

Name: maximize_user_story_points_done
Description: Select stories that raise delivered story points within capacity.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Favor requirements relevant to key stakeholders.

Name: maximize_review_attendance
Description: Aim for broad stakeholder participation in sprint reviews.

Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Schedule work when team availability is high.

Name: maximize_benefit_of_sprint_goal
Description: Prefer sprint goals with higher business benefit.

Name: minimize_cycle_instability
Description: Prefer sprints with stable status progression.
